Injured on 9/8/2043 with a Inflamed Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Injured on 7/9/2046 with a Tight Elbow, out for one week...
Traded from Atlanta to Houston on 2/1/2047 (Going to HOU: P O. Dueñas, RF M. Encarnacion, P B. Hollinger. Going to Atl: P P. Palmer, P W. Smith, 3B G. Kyser)...
Traded from Houston to Tampa Bay on 3/3/2048 (Going to TB: P O. Dueñas. Going to HOU: P M. Berryhill)...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 8/1/2049, going 3-0, 1.26...
Was selected to the 2053 Allstar game...
Signed as a free agent by New York (A) on 2/3/2055 to a 1-year deal worth $9,500,000 per year...
Injured on 9/17/2055 with a Torn Tricep Muscle, out for 5-6 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by New York (A) on 3/3/2056 to a 1-year deal worth $1,600,000 per year...
